name: INSERT_INTO_SEGMENT
body_snippet:
function INSERT_INTO_SEGMENT(parm_structure_id number,parm_segment_no number,parm_segment_value varchar2,parm_segment_value_desc varchar2,parm_seg_val_nature_id number,parm_parent_yn number,have_dep_val_yn number,parm_dep_on_key_id number default null) return number is
  Result number;
  lnum_seg_id_pk number(15):=0;
begin

    if parm_segment_no    = 1  then
     
        insert into wiz_segment01(structure_id,segment_id,dep_on_struc_id,dep_on_key_id,segment_value,segment_value_desc,segment_nature_id,parent_yn,have_dep_val_yn)
        values                   (parm_structure_id,lnum_seg_id_pk,decode(parm_dep_on_key_id,null,null,parm_structure_id),parm_dep_on_key_id,parm_segment_value,parm_segment_value_desc,parm_seg_val_nature_id,parm_parent_yn,have_dep_val_yn)
        returning segment_id into result;

     elsif parm_segment_no = 2  then
    
        insert into wiz_segment02(structure_id,segment_id,dep_on_struc_id,dep_on_key_id,segment_value,segment_value_desc,segment_nature_id,parent_yn,have_dep_val_yn)
        values                   (parm_structure_id,lnum_seg_id_pk,decode(parm_dep_on_key_id,null,null,parm_structure_id),parm_dep_on_key_id,parm_segment_value,parm_segment_value_desc,parm_seg_val_nature_id,parm_parent_yn,have_dep_val_yn)
        returning segment_id into result;
    
     elsif parm_segment_no = 3  then
    
        insert into wiz_segment03(structure_id,segment_id,dep_on_struc_id,dep_on_key_id,segment_value,segment_value_desc,segment_nature_id,parent_yn
